amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to lease or purchase new light-duty vehicles except in accord with the President's memorandum.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to lease or purchase new light duty vehicles for any executive fleet, or for an agency's fleet inventory, except in accordance with Presidential Memorandum-Federal Fleet Performance, dated May 24, 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
